name: Jake The Drake Prototype
description:
This is the first prototype of Jake The Drake game, made with C++ and SDL2 for educational purposes. Here is the source code.

Jake is a duck inspired in the mallard duck plush from TY Beanie Buddy. 

The full game is right now in development and is a roguelike/shoot'em up where you are the cute Jake, who is swimming in a river full of enemies an obstacules.
